message: Let's start with a fair share. Accept and we can end the game.
You offered me a 90/10 split, now it's my turn to make a better offer!
You're trying to take advantage of the inflation, but I'm not falling for it. Meet me in the middle!
I'm not afraid of inflation! Meet me at the high end of the middle!
You're pushing your luck, Bob! Meet me at a more reasonable split.
You're getting closer, but I'm still not there. Time to make a bold move!
Let's call it a draw! I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob.
